---
id: mathematical-constants
title: Mathematical constants
---

The first 1000 digits of some common mathematical constants:

## Pi ($\pi$)

```
3.
```

## Tau ($\tau$)

```
6.
```

## Euler's number ($e$)

```
2.
```

## The golden ratio ($\phi$)

```
1.
```

## $\sqrt2$

```
1.
```

## $\sqrt3$

```
1.
```

## $\sqrt5$

```
2.
```
